page.title: 05School in Clun
page.content: Our school is called St. George's C.E. Aided Primary School. The teaching staff's names are:the Headmaster Mr. T.J.Johnston, Mrs R.M.R. Griffiths and Mrs.J.Field ( 0.1 part time). The other staff are Mrs J. Watts ( cleaner in charge-25 hours per week), Mrs A Moyes ( ancillary helper-10 hours and dinner superviser-6 and a quarter hours per week) and Mrs .S. Francis (Cook in Charge-23 and a quarter hours per week.) There are 41 pupils in the school divided into 2 classes. There is also a nursery with 23 children on roll. The nursery staff are Mrs Mollart the teacher and Miss Meddins the nurse. School outings for 1984/85 were:to the West Mid Show,a pony riding weekend, a camping weekend & a visit to Avoncroft Museum of buildings.
